Sentencas: The long-term stability of the oxygen exchange kinetics of the Sr- and Co-free solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and solid oxide electrolyser cell (SOEC) air electrode material Pr0.8Ca0.2FeO3-delta (PCF82) is investigated by in-situ dc-conductivity relaxation measurements.
Titulo: Long-term stability of oxygen surface exchange kinetics of Pr0.8Ca0.2FeO3-δ against SO2-poisoning

Sentencas: The chemical oxygen surface exchange coefficient k(chem) is determined as a function of time at 700 degrees C under ideal (O-2-Ar atmosphere) and accelerated ageing conditions (O-2-Ar with 2 ppm SO2).
Titulo: Long-term stability of oxygen surface exchange kinetics of Pr0.8Ca0.2FeO3-δ against SO2-poisoning

Sentencas: In pure O-2-Ar PCF82 shows fast oxygen surface exchange kinetics with k(chem) = 6 x 10(-4) cm
Titulo: Long-term stability of oxygen surface exchange kinetics of Pr0.8Ca0.2FeO3-δ against SO2-poisoning

Sentencas: s(-1) and excellent stability for 1000 h. Due to the addition of 2 ppm SO2 to the test gas only a moderate degradation occurs with k(chem) decreasing to 8 x 10(-5) cm s(-1) during further 1000 h. Post-test analyses by scanning (transmission) electron microscopy and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy show S-rich secondary phases in the near surface region of the SO2-poisoned sample.
Titulo: Long-term stability of oxygen surface exchange kinetics of Pr0.8Ca0.2FeO3-δ against SO2-poisoning

Sentencas: These inactive phases occur in an island-like arrangement of relatively large crystals, whereas significant amounts of the surface remain unaffected.
Titulo: Long-term stability of oxygen surface exchange kinetics of Pr0.8Ca0.2FeO3-δ against SO2-poisoning

Sentencas: This effect explains the high stability of the oxygen exchange kinetics of PCF82 against SO2-poisoning in comparison to state-of-the art materials like La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-delta (LSC64).
Titulo: Long-term stability of oxygen surface exchange kinetics of Pr0.8Ca0.2FeO3-δ against SO2-poisoning
